meanings.sent1: The obtainer of the prize was thrilled with their win.
meanings.sent2: The museum's obtainer carefully collected rare artifacts.
meanings.sent3: The obtainer of the last cookie was the happiest person in the room.
meanings.sent4: She was like an expert obtainer of secrets, always finding out the truth.
meanings.sent5: The obtainer of knowledge never stopped seeking answers.

meanings.definition: To acquire or get possession of something.
meanings.sent1: He will obtainer the necessary documents for the project.
meanings.sent2: She obtainered a rare painting at the auction.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to obtainer the toy mouse but failed hilariously.
meanings.sent4: The team managed to obtainer victory in the final moments of the game.
meanings.sent5: She had to obtainer the key to unlock the mystery box.
